# users in Starcraft 14288 (including those that haven't played a game).

Est. total size of uncompressed user pages: 6750MB
Rough est. total size of uncompressed matchlists (assuming 2 pages per player): 3.5GB


Direct access to game details available at
  http://www.iccup.com/starcraft/details/<gameid>.html

Number of games >100,000.

Est. total size of uncompressed details pages: ~5GB
